::DarkMouse:;

She had gotten separated from the others.  She had fallen down a hill 
and then got lost in the forest.  She had used her sence of smell and 
hearing, but it proved to be of no use.  She couldn't find 
Quickstrike, Black Aracnia, Paralysis, any of them.  She was 
hopelessly lost.  

She had been wandering around in the dark forest for a few days now 
and couldn't find any sign of another bot. She stopped near a small 
sand bar and started a small fire and snuggled down for a night.  but 
sleep and rest never came.  She had horrable nightmares about seeing 
the distruction of the Predacons and Maximals.  She saw nothing but 
burned and scorched earth, bots that had been blown apart.  The ships 
as they burned to nothing.  She knew that somehow, this would 
happen.  The end of the planet may be near.  

She woke up shaking ans shivering.  She sat up in a cold sweat.  She 
looked and saw the fire had gone out.  She transformed into mouse 
mode and walked through the trees in the cover of night.  Her 
thoughts were still on her dream.  She had dreamed that same dream 
before.  but something made it feel more real than any other dream 
she had ever had before.  

She walked along as a small warm breeze came up.  It was then that 
she finally came across the scent of another bot.  She felt overjoyed 
by the thought of finally finding another bot.  She walked towards 
the sorce of the scent.
